name: The Horrors at Castle Wülhein
description:
With hundreds of cases solved and thousands of spirits laid to rest, the name Lafosse has become synonymous with the paranormal. But now, ominous nightmares plague your mind day and night. Something is calling you, but the message is far from clear. In perhaps your biggest case yet, take the reins as the psychic detective, Taylor Lafosse, in this interactive horror novel. Investigate the mysterious Castle Wülhein hidden from time deep in the Bavarian Alps.

Put on some eerie ambiance, turn off the lights, and make your trek through the dark castle.
From the author of "The Aether: Life as a God."
